member.name: M:Bohrium.Core.Extensions.ObjectExtensionMethods.ShallowCopy(System.Object)
member.summary: This method calls the MemberwiseClone method to perform a shallow copy operation creating a new object, and then copying the nonstatic fields of the current object to the new object. If a field is a value type, a bit-by-bit copy of the field is performed. If a field is a reference type, the reference is copied but the referred object is not; therefore, the original object and its clone refer to the same object.
